Title: BL-3 HAND HELD EXTINGUISHERS
description: Roll 1D per attempt to extinguish fire

5.description: Fire continues, try again (3 try limit)

6.description: Fire continues, try again (3 try limit)

extinguisher_rules.usage: Each extinguisher may be used once, then it's empty
extinguisher_rules.crew_restrictions: A crewman may not operate a gun during an attack in which he is fighting a fire
extinguisher_rules.rapid_attempts: A crewman may immediately attempt 3 times to put out a fire (use up 3 extinguishers)
extinguisher_rules.failure_consequence: If fire is not out after 3rd try, crew must immediately bailout on Table G-6
extinguisher_rules.removal: Used extinguishers are removed from play

notes: There are 5 portable fire extinguishers in the B-17, represented by individual counters placed on the Crew Placement Chart.
Each may be sprayed once and then it's empty.
A crewman may not operate a gun during an attack in which he is fighting a fire.
A crewman may immediately attempt 3 times to put out a fire (i.e., use up 3 extinguishers).
If the fire is not out after the 3rd try, the crew must immediately bailout on Table G-6.
Used extinguishers are removed from play.
